metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
resource group name where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
subscription id where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

connectorUiConfig.title: Synqly Integration Connector
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The [Synqly](https://synqly.com) connector provides the capability to push security events from Synqly integrations into Microsoft Sentinel using the Azure Logs Ingestion API. Events are automatically normalized to ASIM (Advanced Security Information Model) tables for use with Microsoft Sentinel analytics, workbooks, and hunting queries.

graphQueries.baseQuery: union ASimAuditEventLogs, ASimAuthenticationEventLogs, ASimDhcpEventLogs, ASimDnsActivityLogs, ASimFileEventLogs, ASimNetworkSessionLogs, ASimProcessEventLogs, ASimRegistryEventLogs, ASimUserManagementActivityLogs, ASimWebSessionLogs | where AdditionalFields._ConnectorId == 'SynqlySentinelASIMConnector'

sampleQueries.query: ASimAuditEventLogs | where TimeGenerated > ago(24h) and AdditionalFields._ConnectorId == 'SynqlySentinelASIMConnector' | take 10
ASimAuthenticationEventLogs | where TimeGenerated > ago(24h) and AdditionalFields._ConnectorId == 'SynqlySentinelASIMConnector' | take 10
ASimNetworkSessionLogs | where TimeGenerated > ago(24h) and AdditionalFields._ConnectorId == 'SynqlySentinelASIMConnector' | take 10

union ASimAuditEventLogs, ASimAuthenticationEventLogs, ASimDhcpEventLogs, ASimDnsActivityLogs, ASimFileEventLogs, ASimNetworkSessionLogs, ASimProcessEventLogs, ASimRegistryEventLogs, ASimUserManagementActivityLogs, ASimWebSessionLogs | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d) and AdditionalFields._ConnectorId == 'SynqlySentinelASIMConnector' | summarize count() by EventSchema | order by count_ desc

sampleQueries.description: View ingestion rate by event type
sampleQueries.query: union ASimAuditEventLogs, ASimAuthenticationEventLogs, ASimDhcpEventLogs, ASimDnsActivityLogs, ASimFileEventLogs, ASimNetworkSessionLogs, ASimProcessEventLogs, ASimRegistryEventLogs, ASimUserManagementActivityLogs, ASimWebSessionLogs | where TimeGenerated > ago(24h) and AdditionalFields._ConnectorId == 'SynqlySentinelASIMConnector' | summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), EventSchema | render timechart

dataTypes.name: ASimAuditEventLogs
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery: ASimAuditEventLogs | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d) and AdditionalFields._ConnectorId == 'SynqlySentinelASIMConnector' | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated) | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: ASimAuthenticationEventLogs
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery: ASimAuthenticationEventLogs | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d) and AdditionalFields._ConnectorId == 'SynqlySentinelASIMConnector' | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated) | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: ASimDhcpEventLogs
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery: ASimDhcpEventLogs | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d) and AdditionalFields._ConnectorId == 'SynqlySentinelASIMConnector' | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated) | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: ASimDnsActivityLogs
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery: ASimDnsActivityLogs | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d) and AdditionalFields._ConnectorId == 'SynqlySentinelASIMConnector' | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated) | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: ASimFileEventLogs
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery: ASimFileEventLogs | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d) and AdditionalFields._ConnectorId == 'SynqlySentinelASIMConnector' | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated) | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: ASimNetworkSessionLogs
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery: ASimNetworkSessionLogs | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d) and AdditionalFields._ConnectorId == 'SynqlySentinelASIMConnector' | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated) | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: ASimProcessEventLogs
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery: ASimProcessEventLogs | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d) and AdditionalFields._ConnectorId == 'SynqlySentinelASIMConnector' | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated) | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: ASimRegistryEventLogs
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery: ASimRegistryEventLogs | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d) and AdditionalFields._ConnectorId == 'SynqlySentinelASIMConnector' | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated) | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: ASimUserManagementActivityLogs
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery: ASimUserManagementActivityLogs | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d) and AdditionalFields._ConnectorId == 'SynqlySentinelASIMConnector' | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated) | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: ASimWebSessionLogs
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery: ASimWebSessionLogs | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d) and AdditionalFields._ConnectorId == 'SynqlySentinelASIMConnector' | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated) | where isnotempty(Time)

value: union ASimAuditEventLogs, ASimAuthenticationEventLogs, ASimDhcpEventLogs, ASimDnsActivityLogs, ASimFileEventLogs, ASimNetworkSessionLogs, ASimProcessEventLogs, ASimRegistryEventLogs, ASimUserManagementActivityLogs, ASimWebSessionLogs | where AdditionalFields._ConnectorId == 'SynqlySentinelASIMConnector' | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated) | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(7d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and Write permissions are required for the Log Analytics workspace.

customs.name: Microsoft Entra ID
customs.description: Application Developer role (or higher) to create app registrations.

customs.name: Microsoft Azure
customs.description: Owner or User Access Administrator role on the resource group to deploy DCR and assign Monitoring Metrics Publisher role.

instructionSteps.title: 1. Create ARM Resources and Provide the Required Permissions
instructionSteps.description: This connector enables push-based ingestion of security events from Synqly integrations into Microsoft Sentinel. Events are automatically normalized to ASIM (Advanced Security Information Model) tables.

parameters.content:
#### Deploy Connector Resources
Clicking "Deploy" creates a Data Collection Rule (DCR), Data Collection Endpoint (DCE), and Entra application with the necessary permissions to securely send data to Microsoft Sentinel.

instructionSteps.title: 2. Grant Additional Permissions (Based on Use Case)
instructionSteps.description: Additional roles may be required depending on how you plan to use Synqly with Microsoft Sentinel.

parameters.content:
**Sink Connector (Write-Only)**: No additional permissions needed.

**SIEM Connector (Read/Write)**: Assign **Microsoft Sentinel Contributor** role to the Entra application via the Azure UI in your Log Analytics workspace.

See [Synqly documentation](https://docs.synqly.com/guides/provider-configuration/microsoft-sentinel-siem-setup) for detailed setup guides.

instructionSteps.title: 3. Push your logs into the workspace
instructionSteps.description: Provide these parameters to your Synqly integration. The Synqly service will automatically handle the technical details of data ingestion, including formatting events to one of the 10 supported ASIM schemas (Authentication, AuditEvent, Dhcp, Dns, FileEvent, NetworkSession, ProcessEvent, RegistryEvent, UserManagement, WebSession).

parameters.content: **Important**: Events with unsupported schema types are silently dropped by Azure. If expected data is not appearing, verify with your Synqly integration provider that events are being sent with one of the supported schema types listed above.

parameters.label: Entra App Registration Application ID
parameters.placeholder: Deploy push connector to get the App Registration Application ID

parameters.label: Entra App Registration Secret
parameters.placeholder: Deploy push connector to get the App Registration Secret

parameters.label: Data Collection Endpoint Uri
parameters.placeholder: Deploy push connector to get the Data Collection Endpoint Uri

parameters.label: Data Collection Rule Immutable ID
parameters.placeholder: Deploy push connector to get the Data Collection Rule Immutable ID

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: Please refer to the following before installing the solution:

Review the solution Release Notes

There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

The Synqly Integration Connector for Microsoft Sentinel enables push-based ingestion of security events using ASIM normalization across 10 event types.

Data Connectors: 1

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
